name: Pumpkin Picking
description:
The pumpkins took what you loved most, now you need to get your revenge. Exterminate as many pumpkins as possible while maneuvering your way around a forest. Be careful because as soon as the pumpkins notice you killed their own, you will experience hell.

Note:

If you experience audio bugs, closing and restarting should fix them.

All Assets made by me except for Trees, Buildings, Music, and AR
